body: Your luck takes on almost legendary proportions.
name: Adaptive Fortune
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Halflings/New Racial Rules/Halfling Feats/Adaptive Fortune

sections.body: Fortunate One, adaptable luck racial trait, character level 10th, halfling.
sections.name: Prerequisites

sections.body: Increase the number of times per day you can use the adaptable luck racial trait by 1. Furthermore, when you use adaptable luck, increase the luck bonus for each type of use by 2.
